A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Ok this movie is definitely flawed I won’t ignore that\, but the overall story had me watching so intently that I couldn’t look away. I swear my jaw was on the ground for half the movie. Some people didn’t like the direction that Rian Johnson took\, but apart from a very few things\, I really enjoyed the way he did it. I’ve never been more surprised (in a good way) by a Star Wars movie. I just hope JJ Abrams does a satisfying job on Episode IX. like I said\, definitely flawed\, but enjoyable nonetheless. Easily the best since Empire. I rate it 8.5/10. Currently my 3rd favorite Star Wars movie\, with A new hope 2nd\, and Empire 1st.
